title: Where can we find the best and new online courses in computer science? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the Name of Allaah, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful. All due praise belongs to Allaah, and may salutations and peace be upon the Messenger of Allaah, upon his family, companions and those who follow his guidance. To proceed… Look out on platforms like Coursera, EdX, Udemy, Udacity etc. And Allaah knows best.

Paid online courses websites udacity, udemy, coursera etc. Free online courses websites are alisons, javatpoint etc. YouTube is the best option this time where you can learn content and courses of computer science. Some youtube channel learn online computer science courses are freecodecamp, mysirg, telusko, tutorials point, traversy media,newboston etc.
